## TelemetryConfig interface

Provides a {<!-- -->NodeSDKConfiguration<!-- -->} configuration for use with the Open-Telemetry SDK. This configuration allows plugins to specify how and where open telemetry data will be exported.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface TelemetryConfig 
```
